title: Is The Talisman by Stephen King still a popular book in 2020? What can one gain from reading it today? - Quora

response.answer_text: Popularity, I couldn’t say. What one can gain from it? A couple of things. Entertainment. It’s a good yarn. It’s a quest story, an epic journe, filtered through the joint sensibilities of King and Straub.Novelty. At the time, it felt novel to see two bestselling authors collaborate in this way, and I think it still is quite unusual.
